job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Company was founded remotely -REMOTE
job.description: We were founded in April 2020 on a simple premise people want to buy from stores that are run by people in their community They want their money to benefit their local economy by shopping locallyand the more accessible and convenient it is the more frequently theyll choose to do sobrbrIf you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Partner with fellow software engineers to design build test deploy and maintain our softwarelili Be an active champion for high quality software developmentlili Be an active contributor in shaping and evolving our productbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli JavaScriptlili graphqllili TailwindbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Excellent compensation packagelili World class teamlili 100 Work from HomebrliulSo if you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrRyanMottleyCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  RM71649068  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulRyan Mottley  Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
